Arshpreet

Bellevue, WA · (747) 744-7421 · aarshpre@asu.edu

With 5+ years of experience in data engineering, analysis, and AI, I don’t just build reports and pipelines, I architect agents and workflows that help businesses make smarter choices, faster.
What I do:
• Design and deploy AI-driven data solutions that serve insights, automation, and decision-making support.
• Integrate cloud data platforms, real-time analytics, and machine learning agents to convert raw data into actionable outcomes.
• Partner with business stakeholders to translate needs into scalable architectures, and deliver metrics-driven results.
Impact I’ve delivered:
• Automated report/ prod site testing using Playwright and ADO MCP, that auto-navigates through the page elements, takes screenshots of visual/ site load errors and generates an AzureDevOps bug capturing load error details, saving manual testing time ~30 mins daily and helps to address issues proactively.
• Designed an automated Business Requirements Document (BRD) generation tool, saving approximately 3 hours per document for analysts.
• Built and maintained end-to-end AI-ready data engineering infrastructure on cloud platforms, powering Power BI reports enhanced with Data Agents, to answer natural language queries for business stakeholders.
Why I love doing this:
Because data is only as powerful as the action it enables. I thrive on connecting the dots between data ingestion, staging, developing KPIs and metrics for visualization, and user outcomes. I’m motivated by complexity: large data volumes, real-world edge-cases, systems that need to scale. Plus I enjoy the creative side of building intelligent agents that aide in generating insights.
I’m keen to join teams building the next wave of analytics-powered products, or driving digital transformation using AI and data at scale.
✉️ Feel free to drop me a message if you want to discuss data, agent architecture, or how we can build something smarter together.

Experience

Senior Data Analyst / Data Engineer

MAQ Software

Designed and orchestrated end-to-end data pipelines using Azure Data Factory to ingest, transform, and load enterprise learning and customer success data into the Microsoft Fabric Lakehouse, enabling AI-ready analytics and advanced Power BI reporting. Partnered with 6 Microsoft stakeholders in an Agile Scrum environment to define business requirements, user stories, and acceptance criteria, driving a $1.76M project to successful delivery through Azure DevOps.

August 2023 - Present

Data Analyst

MAQ Software

Delivered 40+ executive-level Power BI dashboards with 28K+ views, empowering Microsoft stakeholders with actionable learning insights. Led cross-functional teams of 15+ in architecting data models, optimizing DAX measures, and managing KPIs such as NSAT and NPS, improving course completion by 15%.

August 2022 - August 2023

Senior Analyst

Capgemini

Managed purchase applications for a leading French pharmaceutical client, enhancing operational efficiency and cutting deployment time by 67%. Designed and deployed a Tableau dashboard integrated with ServiceNow to track ticket inflow and SLA performance, boosting client satisfaction scores from 3.5 to 4.5. Automated the service request system to reduce time-to-resolution SLAs by 33%, and led the successful year-end data migration of 2M purchase orders to the SQL UAT environment for testing and validation.

August 2019 - July 2021

Interests

Outside of work, I’m passionate about exploring how AI is reshaping data engineering and analytics — from automating pipelines to generating intelligent business insights. I love experimenting with AI-driven tools that boost productivity and bring creativity into technical workflows.

Beyond data, you’ll find me outdoors hiking, cycling, or practicing Karate. Indoors, I unwind with a good novel or a painting session (and sometimes, reluctantly — chores).
